title: Anachronox [ENG] [ISO]
description:
Published by: Eidos Interactive
Developed by: Ion Storm
Genre: RPG
Number of Players: 1
Release Date: US - June 27, 2001
ESRB Content Descriptors: Animated Violence, Mature Sexual Themes

Minimum Requirements:
PII266MHz
64 MB
3D accelerator

Recommended Requirements:
Pentium III 500 MHz
Windows 98/ME
128 MB RAM
16 MB DirectX-compatible 3D video card supporting OpenGL
8x CD-ROM drive

A Tom Hall&#039;s role-playing game based on id Software&#039;s popular Quake II engine. Sylvester "Sly" Boots and his companion, Stiletto Anyway, must travel across the galaxy and through three dimensions to unravel the story of a long-dead alien race and their advanced technology. Mysterious beings (perhaps the remnants of the very race they&#039;re attempting to learn more about?) are bent on destroying our entire universe, and it&#039;s up to Sly, Stiletto, and five other characters to help answer the questions about these beings, and save the universe from annihilation.

2 original CD images + 5 patches + demo + video + wallpapers + "Anachronox the Movie" from Jake Strider Hughes + Oblivion Map for Quake 1 (unused secret level for Anachronox)
